import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import '../../styles/style.css'; import apiCall from '../../util/apiCall'; export default class Statistic extends Component { state = { stockStats: null, stockEPS: null } getStats (symbol) { if(symbol) { const endpoint = `/api/stock/${symbol}/stats` const promise = apiCall(endpoint,'get') promise.then(blob => blob.json()).then (json=> { console.log("STATS", json) this.setState({ stockStats: json.stats, stockEPS: json.eps }) }) }} componentDidMount(){ if(this.props.match.params.symbol) { this.getStats(this.props.match.params.symbol) } } render() { const {companyName,marketcap,peRatio,dividendYield,employees,beta,avg30Volume,day30ChangePercent, ttmEPS,ttmDividendRate,week52change,year1ChangePercent,week52low,week52high} = this.state if(this.props.match.params.symbol) { console.log("STATISTIC tickerToLOOK", this.props.match.params.symbol) console.log(this.state.stats.companyName) } return (
